name: VRMN NVZN
description:
Stop the vermin invasion before they destroy the human race! These intergalactic space vermins are not smart -- but they have the numbers. Some of their elite members are behind this attack, manipulating the space centipedes and bees into their attacks. When you uncover the plot, you can bring an end to the war.

Ten levels are planned. Each level has story significance. Dozens of entities and enemy types will be made. This game will remain open source software.

Features:
  • 4 uniquely programmed enemies
    • More coming soon
  • Ten levels (only 3 playable currently)
  • Difficulty selection
    • Easy - Slower enemies, more checkpoints, shoot two bullets instead of one
    • Normal - Original design; fairly challenging. Forgiving.
  • End of level summaries
  • Entities
    • Timed lasers
    • Explosive barrels (currently not explosive)
  • Powerups (6 of them!)
  • A simple story
    • Cinematic / timed events
  • Two colors!

Please show your support if you would like me to continue to work on it. Your support is very appreciated.
